title: BRIEF-Fitch Says Global Telcos' 5G Capex Risk Contained; Leverage Stretched
text:
BRIEF-Fitch Says Global Telcos' 5G Capex Risk Contained; Leverage Stretched

Stock Markets 7 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 09:20)

BRIEF-Fitch Says Global Telcos' 5G Capex Risk Contained; Leverage Stretched Oct 7 (Reuters) - Fitch Ratings:

* FITCH SAYS GLOBAL TELCOS' 5G CAPEX RISK CONTAINED;

LEVERAGE

STRETCHED

* EXPECTS CAPEX RISK FOR MOST TELCOS TO BE CONTAINED OVER

THE NEXT

18 MONTHS

* PRESSURE TO ACQUIRE WIDER SPECTRUM BANDS TO SUPPORT FUTURE

5G

ROLLOUT WILL REDUCE RATING HEADROOM

* S. KOREAN TELCOS LIKELY TO BE AMONG GLOBAL LEADERS' 5G

INVESTMENTS, RAISING CAPEX/REVENUE TO 20%-22% THROUGH 2020

* 5G IMPLEMENTATION WILL REMAIN PATCHY UNTIL 2021

* EXPECT MOST TELECOMS MARKETS TO DEPEND ON EXISTING 4G AND

4G

PLUS TECHNOLOGIES IN THE NEXT FEW YEARS

* COST OF 5G SPECTRUM PER MHZ IS LIKELY TO DECLINE, BUT THE

WIDE-RANGING FREQUENCIES REQUIRED WILL RAISE INVESTMENT

* IMPACT OF 5G UPCYCLE, SPECTRUM PAYMENTS TO PUT MORE

PRESSURE ON

OPERATORS' FCF IN EMERGING MARKETS, LIKE INDIA, PHILIPPINES,

INDONESIA, SRI LANKA
